Room.title: Entrance Hall
Room.description: The main entrance to the building, with a grand staircase leading up.

Room.title: Library
Room.description: A quiet room filled with shelves of books and comfortable reading chairs.

Room.title: Dining Room
Room.description: A large room with a long dining table and ornate decorations.

Room.title: Study
Room.description: A small room with a desk, computer, and various office supplies.

Room.title: Kitchen
Room.description: A modern kitchen with all the latest appliances and a large island in the center.
